channel.title: A Detailed Summary of Nathan Barry’s Book: Authority
channel.description:
Nathan Barry's book [Authority](http://nathanbarry.com/authority) has been the single most useful ebook I've purchased. I'm using it to write my own self-published book [Mastering HubSpot](http://robsobers.com/mastering-hubspot).
I've read the book twice and the second time around I took really detailed notes. I put them together on my blog in case anyone wants a taste of what the book is about.
I highlighted many of the main ideas, which can take you pretty far as a self-publisher, but the book itself has lots more detail and some excellent case studies.
http://robsobers.com/summary-of-nathan-barrys-authority/
I hope this is helpful!
